title: New airborne research facility observes sensitivity of cumulus cloud microphysical properties to aerosol regime over the great barrier reef
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article

Diana C. Hernandez-Jaramillo, Chris Medcraft, Ramon Campos Braga, Peter Butcherine, Adrian Doss, Brendan Kelaher, Daniel Rosenfeld, Daniel P. Harrison
The new research aircraft, Cessna 337, is equipped with a meteorological, aerosol, and cloud microphysical instrumentation. A case study from its first campaign is presented showing the sensitivity of cumulus cloud microphysical properties to the aerosol regime over the Great Barrier Reef.
